org.patneu.simpleflash

Class SimpleFlash.SettingsManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.patneu.simpleflash.SimpleFlash.SettingsManager
  • Enclosing class:
    SimpleFlash

    protected class SimpleFlash.SettingsManager
extends java.lang.Object
    Inner class that handles the settings of the application.

    Note: This class is used to set and get the settings during the normal workflow of the Activity. To permanently save and load the user preferences use an instance of the SimpleFlash.PrefsManager class.
    Since:
    Version 1.0

      • setScreenOn

        protected void setScreenOn(boolean on)
        Sets wether the device's screen should remain on when the screen is locked.

        Note: This method only sets wether the screen should remain on, but doesn't actually undertake any steps to do that. Please refer to keepScreenOn(boolean) for doing this.
        Parameters:
        on - wether the device's screen should remain on or not
        Since:
        Version 1.0
        See Also:
        isScreenOn()

      • isScreenOn

        protected boolean isScreenOn()
        Returns wether the device's screen should remain on when the screen is locked.

        Note: This method only returns wether the screen should remain on, but not if any steps were actually undertaken to do that. It's the task of any other method using this setting to do the necessary checks.
        Returns:
        wether the device's screen should remain on or not
        Since:
        Version 1.0
        See Also:
        setScreenOn(boolean)

      • setLockExit

        protected void setLockExit(boolean lock)
        Sets wether the SimpleFlash.exitItem should be locked when the screen is locked.

        Note: This method only sets wether the exitItem should be locked, but doesn't actually undertake any steps to do that. It's the task of any other method using this setting to do the necessary preparations.
        Parameters:
        lock - wether the exitItem should be locked or not
        Since:
        Version 1.0
        See Also:
        isExitLocked(), SimpleFlash.onOptionsItemSelected(android.view.MenuItem)

      • setNotificationClick

        protected void setNotificationClick(int click)
        Sets the action that should be performed when a shown CameraOnNotification is clicked.

        The 'click' parameter should be one of the static 'NOTIFICATION_XXX' values defined in the CameraOnNotification class.
        Parameters:
        click - the action that should be performed
        Since:
        Version 1.0
        See Also:
        getNotificationClick()

      • getNotificationClick

        protected int getNotificationClick()
        Returns the action that should be performed when a shown CameraOnNotification is clicked.

        The returned value should be one of the static 'NOTIFICATION_XXX' values defined in the CameraOnNotification class.
        Returns:
        the action that should be performed
        Since:
        Version 1.0
        See Also:
        setNotificationClick(int)
